item.description:
We will ascend the treeless summit of the 3,475' Mt Chocorua via the Brook Trail off the Paugus Mill Road. Descent via the Liberty Trail, passing the Jim Liberty cabin as seen here.

This is a beautiful autumn loop, and offers a new perspective on Chocorua for those who have only taken the Champney Trail.

This is a 7.5 mile round trip. We'll be hiking faster than "book time" pace. Participants must be physically fit. We may or may not encounter ice at this time of year, so light traction (stabilicers or microspikes) is required, as well as suitable layers for hiking above treeline in potentially cold and windy conditions.
item.name: Mount Chocorua - south side loop
